item.title: The normal, Edgeworth, saddlepoint and uniform approximations to the Wilcoxon–Mann–Whitney null-distribution: a numerical comparison
item.description: Raphaël Bean, Sorana Froda, Constance Van Eeden “The normal, Edgeworth, saddlepoint and uniform approximations to the Wilcoxon–Mann–Whitney null-distribution: a numerical comparison” (2004) // Journal of Nonparametric Statistics. Vol. 16. No 1-2. Pp. 279–288.
